attributes.action: Make all local Authorities provide free parking to their workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do you work for a local authority?
Do you spend more than 10% of your monthly wage paying to park?
Does your manager get free parking?
If you have answered yes to all these questions please sign the petition.
I believe that all local authorities should provide free or atleast cheaper parking for all workers.

I need your assistance so they can recognise this problem.
